document.full_text: golf's other seve, little-known briton seve benson, saluted the spanish great after a tribute day was held for the five-times major winner at the pga championship friday.
document.title: british seve hails ballesteros on wentworth tribute day
lines_and_colors: golf's other seve, little-known briton seve benson, saluted the spanish great after a tribute day was held for the five-times major winner at the pga championship friday.
